name: Gorasul: The Legacy of the Dragon
name_original: Gorasul: The Legacy of the Dragon
description:
Gorasul: The Legacy of the Dragon is a RPG-arcade game developed by SilverStyle Entertainment. It was originally released in 2001. It was published by JoWooD Productions. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
You can play Gorasul: The Legacy of the Dragon on PC.
